creditline: Gift of Tom and Pat Peterson
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: carved, painted figure with an object in each hand (green pattern catcus-like tube in PR hand, container with bulbus end in PL); face with black painted circles and U-shapes for eyes and mouth, red circles on cheeks, and red ears sticking out on either side; vertical red stripes over top half of face; fitted black cap with white edges; brown and black neck piece; tan, red, and black cape over black tunic with green and red stripe around bottom; sash at waist with black, red, green and tan patterns; tan boots with black soles; figure standing on wood round
inscription: bottom of base in black marker: Ken Shupln
title: Katsinam
